alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Cotton; Grady; Stephens; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:58AM CDT until July 09 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... South central Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Western Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wichita County in northern Texas... Central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 358 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cement to 4 miles west of Lawton to near Fargo, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Duncan, Marlow, Frederick, Walters, Elgin, Apache, Geronimo, Rush Springs, Bray, Fletcher, Grandfield, Temple, Sterling, Chattanooga, Davidson, Devol, Faxon, Hollister, and Loveland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Comanche; Cotton; Grady; Stephens; Tillman
